item.description:
This week we welcome back Cambridge after a brief stint across the river. No worries we'll be spreading out incubators all summer. Come back to our usual locale at the Democracy Center this week for some fun, laughter, and improv games. I'm fresh off of an awesome incubator at this past weekend's Boston Skillshare and fresh off a class in laughter yoga. I'll mix in some fun stuff and hopefully just get us to laugh and explore our arms, legs, brains, and elbows just for good measure haha.

Bring a smile and a friend. No improv experience required.

Let's keep up the summer fun inside esp. when there's so many thunderstorms loomings

$3 suggested donation pays for room and meetup.com costs.

Questions, concerns, let me know.

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: Improv and the City (of Cambridge) 2
